title: Blue Christmas
lyrics:
I'll have a blue Christmas without you
I'll be so blue just thinking about you
Decorations of red on a green Christmas tree
Won't be the same deer if you're not here with me
And when those blue snowflakes start falling
That's when those blue, oh, those blue memories start calling
You'll be doing all right
With your Christmas of white
Oh, but I'll have a blue Christmas
You'll be doing all right
Oh, with your Christmas of white
Oh, but I'll have a blue, blue blue Christmas
You'll be doing all right
With your Christmas of white
But I'll have a blue, blue, blue blue Christmas
